apple_vendor_description: This heartwarming emoji, rendered with Apple's signature attention to detail, portrays a loving couple with medium-dark skin tone for the woman and dark skin tone for the man, embracing closely. Their forms are sculpted with soft rounded edges and subtle, realistic lighting that highlights their connection and affection. On Apple devices, the subtle blush on their cheeks and the tender gaze convey deep emotional bonds and romantic love, making it an ideal way to express partnership and heartfelt sentiment.
